channel.title: [REP++] Lil' issue adding GE (Tut) to my FIRST Delta

item.title: [REP++] Lil' issue adding GE (Tut) to my FIRST Delta
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Even though eclipse will point out simple errors etc, it might not be able to sort this for you. The simple way to check if you have just one too many brackets or whatever, open it in notepad, search for { and } seperately and count the number of hits. But it could be one of those where you’ll have to look through everything you’ve added to fin the mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: [REP++] Lil' issue adding GE (Tut) to my FIRST Delta
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Valazar:

Use an IDE, Eclipse will find the issue no problem!

Ofcourse!
I forgot i had Eclipse on this computer
I’ll test it if it works i’ll rep you :)[quote=“ohokay, post:5, topic:460467”]Not on the computer at the moment. It could be an anti leech. But just have a look through everything you’ve added, count brackets etc[/quote]
And maybe you’ll get some Rep to
EDIT:I tried but it’s a long time ago i worked with it, any help please?

Read full topic
